title: Hazardous Waste Field Investigation Simulation-Based Practical Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of environmental engineering, understanding of waste management regulations, and familiarity with basic field investigation procedures
context.additional_context: Aims to cultivate integrated application skills of theory and practice for current practitioners. Learning environments are structured using simulation tools similar to ISIS (Interactive Site Investigation Software).

learning_goals: Analyzing and applying physical and engineering processes in hazardous waste field investigations using simulation tools
Strengthening the competency to integrate theoretical knowledge and practical skills for solving complex open-ended problems
Evaluating decision-making abilities in real-world field investigation scenarios through team-based collaboration
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
